name: SwiftAvroCore
description: The SwiftAvroCore framework implements the core coding functionalities that are required in Apache Avro™. The schema format support Avro 1.8.2 and later Specification. It provides user-friendly Codable interface introduced from Swift 5 to encode and decode Avro schema, binray data as well as the JSON format data.
summary: The SwiftAvroCore framework implements the core coding functionalities that are required in Apache Avro™.
